body_html:
Hi Mrry,

Thanks very much for your kind reply!
as you suggested, I changed the part of code to:

    output = tf.reshape(tf.concat(1, outputs), [-1, size])
    softmax_w_t = tf.get_variable("softmax_w", [vocab_size, size])
    softmax_w = tf.transpose(softmax_w_t)
    softmax_b = tf.get_variable("softmax_b", [vocab_size])

    if use_sample_softmax == True:
      loss = tf.nn.sampled_softmax_loss(softmax_w_t, softmax_b, output, tf.reshape(self._targets, [-1, 1]), num_samples, vocab_size) #todo
      self._cost = cost = tf.reduce_sum(loss) / batch_size
    else:
      logits = tf.matmul(output, softmax_w) + softmax_b
      loss = tf.nn.seq2seq.sequence_loss_by_example(
          [logits],
          [tf.reshape(self._targets, [-1])],
          [tf.ones([batch_size * num_steps])])
      self._cost = cost = tf.reduce_sum(loss) / batch_size

And yes, the speed now becomes
sample
1024 1500wps
128 1731wps

It seems more normal now.

Also, maybe the developers want to change the code in source/tensorflow/tensorflow/models/rnn/translate/seq2seq_model.py, because there a transpose of matrix is also feed into a smapled softmax

Thanks!
Goose

body:
Hi Mrry,

Thanks very much for your kind reply!
as you suggested, I changed the part of code to:

```
    output = tf.reshape(tf.concat(1, outputs), [-1, size])
    softmax_w_t = tf.get_variable("softmax_w", [vocab_size, size])
    softmax_w = tf.transpose(softmax_w_t)
    softmax_b = tf.get_variable("softmax_b", [vocab_size])

    if use_sample_softmax == True:
      loss = tf.nn.sampled_softmax_loss(softmax_w_t, softmax_b, output, tf.reshape(self._targets, [-1, 1]), num_samples, vocab_size) #todo
      self._cost = cost = tf.reduce_sum(loss) / batch_size
    else:
      logits = tf.matmul(output, softmax_w) + softmax_b
      loss = tf.nn.seq2seq.sequence_loss_by_example(
          [logits],
          [tf.reshape(self._targets, [-1])],
          [tf.ones([batch_size * num_steps])])
      self._cost = cost = tf.reduce_sum(loss) / batch_size
```

And yes, the speed now becomes
sample 
1024 1500wps 
128 1731wps

It seems more normal now.

Also, maybe the developers want to change the code in source/tensorflow/tensorflow/models/rnn/translate/seq2seq_model.py, because there a transpose of matrix is also feed into a smapled softmax

Thanks!
Goose
